price: 3. Nous l’avons fait descendre (en révélation) par une nuit bénie,[486] et Nous Nous devions d’avertir.
arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ فِي لَيۡلَةٖ مُّبَٰرَكَةٍۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُنذِرِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: innā anzalnāhu fī laylatin mubārakatin innā kunnā mundhirīna
